title: Modern Didot / Didone font
content:
Hi!

I am looking for a Modern Didone. Preferly with a rounded curve between the stem and serif / arms (Look at the attached file)

It could be great to find the specific, but alternatives are welcome.

So far what i can find is these:

Benton Modern Display - [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/benton-modern-display/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150301010156/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/benton-modern-display/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/benton-modern-display/")  
Miller Banner Roman - [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/miller-banner/roman/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150301010156/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/miller-banner/roman/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/miller-banner/roman/")
